messages.subject: God matching parents
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/25/02 12:47:35 AM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/25/02 12:47:35 AM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<<
As far as how God places children, I believe that He matches the
correct child with the correct parents all the time, but that sin
often gets in the way and parents don't parent the way God intended
for them to. >>

So you think that the drug addict that gets pregnant and dumps her baby in
the trash was "matched up" by God?
He didn't know that the final result would be that?
Give me a break. Thoughts like this are insidious to me.
If God is omnipotent, wouldn't he know how sick some people are, and that
they shouldn't be parents? Why in the H**** would a loving God purposely give
some children to parents he knows would abuse them, kill them, hurt them and
then do it again and again??
Don't answer that please. I'm only asking out of sheer awe that people
actually believe this.
Not for an answer. I'm sure it would repulse me.

Ren
